content:
I am a football fan and I am interested in knowing the profile of player Leo Messi. Can you provide me with the details?
Begin!

I'll help you retrieve Leo Messi's profile using the transfermarket tool. 

Thought: To get Messi's profile, I'll need to use the players_get_profile_for_transfermarket function. However, I'll first need to use the domain parameter, and I'll choose the most common domain "com" for international coverage.

name: players_get_header_info_for_transfermarket
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'share': {'title': 'Lionel Messi - Player profile', 'url': 'https://www.transfermarkt.com/lionel-messi/profil/spieler/28003', 'image': None, 'description': 'This is the player profile of referee Lionel Messi.'}, 'data': {'player': {'id': '28003', 'name': 'Lionel Messi', 'image': 'https://img.a.transfermarkt.technology/portrait/medium/28003-1710080339.jpg?lm=1', 'imageLarge': 'https://img.a.transfermarkt.technology/portrait/big/28003-1710080339.jpg?lm=1', 'imageSource': 'Major League Soccer', 'shirtNumber': '10', 'age': None, 'dateOfBirth': None, 'heroImage': None, 'isGoalkeeper': False, 'positions': None, 'nationalities': [{'id': 9, 'name': 'Argentina', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/small/9.png?lm=1520611569'}, {'id': 157, 'name': 'Spain', 'image': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/small/157.png?lm=1520611569'}], 'marketValue': {'value': 20000000, 'currency': '\u20ac', 'progression': None}}, 'club': {'id': '69261', 'name': 'Miami', 'fullName': 'Inte...
Now, I'll get his full profile:

name: players_get_profile_for_transfermarket
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'share': {'title': 'Lionel Messi - Player profile', 'url': 'https://www.transfermarkt.com/lionel-messi/profil/spieler/28003', 'description': 'This is the player profile of referee Lionel Messi.'}, 'playerProfile': {'playerID': '28003', 'playerImage': 'https://img.a.transfermarkt.technology/portrait/medium/28003-1710080339.jpg?lm=1', 'playerName': 'Lionel Messi', 'playerFullName': 'Lionel Messi', 'birthplace': 'Rosario', 'dateOfBirth': 'Jun 24, 1987', 'dateOfDeath': None, 'playerShirtNumber': '10', 'birthplaceCountry': 'Argentina', 'birthplaceCountryImage': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/verysmall/9.png?lm=1520611569', 'age': '37', 'height': '1,70', 'foot': 'left', 'internationalTeam': 'Argentina', 'internationalTeamImage': 'https://tmssl.akamaized.net//images/flagge/verysmall/9.png?lm=1520611569', 'internationalTeamStatus': 'Current international', 'internationalGames': '191', 'internationalGoals': '112', 'internationalTeamShortTag': 'A', 'internationalShirtNumber': '1...

function.arguments:

function.name: Finish
